https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q0xAFCyGoOYHZyFD3uxhZL10Xe6.jpg Sylvia's work increasingly takes her away from the three men who help bring up Mary, her daughter. When she decides to move to England and take Mary with her, the three men are heartbroken at losing the two most important females in their lives. 3 Men and a Little Lady
